Wolfblade::

She waited at the applegrove for him to re-emerge from the base
entrance.   She had seen Silence fly out and return.  She started to
worry. She shook her head. "Warriors don't worry. Don't be foolish.
He'll cfome out soon."  But soon, it would be dark. Soon it would be
only the light of the moon to  witness anything. She was beginning to
wonder if he would ever come out again. The pit has no furry like a
femme bot scorned.  She transformed into wolf mode and laid down with
her head on her paws, hoping for his return.
